Call Cyclops Tribe

Summon Units:#3381 Cyclops x 5+[1/2 lvl]
There are in Ind many strange men. Large men, small men, and men with eyes in the back. There are also Cyclopses living in Magnificent Ind. Groups of these giants can be contacted and convinced to serve the Prester King.
